timeline.message: Update DirectPath tests to use the new opt-in method instead of env var; Change fallback tests to blackhole all ipv4 and ipv6 DP addresses

timeline.author: igorbernstein2

commits_in_main.message: chore(test): fix api breakage in DirectPath integration tests (#1157)

timeline.author: igorbernstein2

commits_in_main.message: feat: extend channel priming logic to also send fake requests (#398)
feat: add keepalive changes in java client library (#409)
chore: make version embedding more robust (#451)
fix: Make refreshing channel compatible with BigtableDataClientFactory (#474)
fix: readRowSettings use manual readRows settings instead of gapics (#494)
fix: make keepalive params a bit conservative (#528)
feat: use PingAndWarm request for channel priming (#1179)
feat: enable channel priming by default (#1555)
